name: Vancouver_6-Foot_Dining_Table_with_Built-in_Extension_Leaf
reviews: this table is really well built, very solid, the oak is beautiful. Simple to assemble, just 2 bolts in each leg, even comes with the wrench. Definitely needed 2 people to move it into the dining room. The butterfly leaf mechanism works great. We are very pleased with this purchase.
description: The Vancouver six-foot dining table with built-in extension leaf has been designed with traditional hand-crafted construction. This stunning piece features beautiful clean golden oak and stylish tapered legs finished with heavy gauge rustic plate brass handles. Bestowing pride and practicality is guaranteed to stand the test of time.Materials: Solid oakFinish: Oak, brass hardwareGently beveled cornersHand-craftedExtends to 71 inches in lengthDimensions (overall): 31 inches high x 35.5 inches wide x 55 inches longOverall dimensions with extension: 31 inches high x 35.5 inches wide x 71 inches longProduct weight: 182.9 lbs.Shape: RectangleFurniture Room: Dining Room, KitchenStyle: Country, Farmhouse, TraditionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: OakStyleCountry, Farmhouse, TraditionalMaterialOakFinishOak FinishShapeRectangleAssemblyAssembly RequiredSeats Up To8
